thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Government Causes High Electric Rates in California

author: wsjcom
title: Government Causes High Electric Rates in California
text:
The letters of May 16 address California’s new solar power for homes mandate. I identify with Steven Schlosser. We were right there with him at $3,200-plus a year, and that was with no air conditioning, at 29-cents-plus per kilowatt hour, while subsidizing Arizona. After installing 26 solar panels, we now get $80 back at the end of the year, and our electric bills are under $10 a month.
What is bad in our “nanny state” is the increase in our utility bills to pay for “green” energy. We have folks complaining on the website...
